rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with Art Deco inspired detailing. Wheelchair accessible.
Large living room with geometric patterns and elegant finishes, featuring a Vastu compliant open layout facing east for positive energy flow.
Dining area that seamlessly connects to the kitchen, decorated in Art Deco style with symmetry and ornamental detailing. Accessible route provided.
Modern kitchen integrated with classic design elements of Art Deco, wheelchair accessible with adjustable counters.
Dedicated home office space designed with Art Deco accents and efficient storage. Vastu principles incorporated to enhance productivity by positioning it in the north-east corner.
Master bedroom with an attached bathroom, designed to maximize privacy with Art Deco motifs, wheelchair accessible layout.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards the northwest for optimal energy flow according to Vastu, ensuring a welcoming entrance.
Large window providing natural light and ventilation on the southeast side of the living room.
Ventilation opening on the roof, facing west to help dissipate heat from the West-facing plot and promote air circulation.
